EmailTemplate.name: Primary parents meet the teacher
EmailTemplate.subject: Primary Parents Meet the Teacher
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
British International School Kuala Lumpur Chartered By The British Schools Foundation
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
For Primary (Year 1 - 6) Parents:
For all parents of Primary children, please be reminded that you can meet your child's teacher on Thursday 28th August from 1-3pm.
Kind regards Alison Mackey British International School Kuala Lumpur World Class Education
_________________________________________________________ Kuala Lumpur - Sao Paulo - Manila - Moscow - Nanjing - Tashkent - Pamplona - Marbella
